name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Battle Orchestra
description:
Shin seiki Evangelion: Battle Orchestra (新世紀エヴァンゲリオン バトルオーケストラ) is a Fighting video game published by Broccoli released on June 28th, 2007 for the PlayStation 2.
Shinseiki Evangelion: Battle Orchestra Portable (新世紀エヴァンゲリオン バトルオーケストラ PORTABLE) is a Fighting video game published by Broccoli released on July 30th, 2009 for the PlayStation Portable.
